meanings.definition: In a humorous or absurd manner
meanings.sent1: The clown farcically juggled colorful balls at the circus.
meanings.sent2: She farcically imitated a famous comedian to make her friends laugh.
meanings.sent3: The movie portrayed the characters farcically trying to solve a mystery.
meanings.sent4: His attempts to fix the broken toy were farcically unsuccessful.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as the magician farcically pulled a rabbit out of his hat.

meanings.sent2: He farcically claimed to have seen a UFO in his backyard.
meanings.sent3: The chef farcically added a mountain of salt to the soup by mistake.
